samples.name: OAuth sample app
samples.description: This sample app demonstrates how to authenticate a HubSpot app using OAuth 2.0 and make your first API call.

samples.name: CRM Objects sample app
samples.description: This sample app demonstrates how to create and manage CRM objects using the CRM v3 Objects API.

samples.name: Custom Object sampleApp
samples.description: This sample app demonstrates how to create and manage CRM custom objects using the CRM v3 Custom Objects API.
